description:
Intuitive and customisable tours for user onboarding.
Walkthrough Onboarding Tour bubble plugin for creating user tours and on-boarding steps for your apps
place the walkthrough visual element anywhere in the page and your steps in the data field.this way target|content|title(optional)|order(optional). each step in a new line


Demo : https://apex-charts-79431.bubbleapps.io/version-test/walkthrough?debug_mode=true
name: Walkthrough Onboarding Tour
